entity.query:
DECLARE @SQL VARCHAR(MAX)=''
SET @SQL = (SELECT Concat('DROP TABLE ', Quotename(Upper(NAME)), '; ') FROM SYS.TABLES WHERE NAME LIKE 'ST_%[0-9]' AND Try_convert(DATE, RIGHT(NAME, Charindex('_', Reverse(NAME)) - 1)) <= Dateadd(DD, -1, Cast(Getdate() AS DATE)) FOR XML PATH ('')) EXEC( @SQL )
